lead_paragraph: A day after Michael Rasmussen of Denmark vaulted into the race lead by setting a torrid pace over three big Alpine passes, riders get a rest day before returning to the mountains and tackling the first “beyond category” climb.
snippet: A day after Michael Rasmussen of Denmark vaulted into the race lead by setting a torrid pace over three big Alpine passes, riders get a rest day before returning to the mountains and tackling the first “beyond category” climb.
